channel.title: Npc training?
channel.description:
object training is a thing of the past for me does anyone know were i should start for npc training because i really need to mod how much xp it gives you, and i also need to know how to determen level just give me an example and were to put it and i will figure the rest out. thanks
-barking

item.title: Npc training?
item.dc:creator: @barkingdogc barkingdogc
item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

what does fight type mean? is that npc id? and is TotalExp), playerDefence); custom stuff that i add myself?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc training?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

one sec ive changed it before
ill brb

boolean attacknpc
at the very bottom
mines somthing like this

if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);

Read full topic
